privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: TimeCraft is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about our data practices. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our time management and wellness application.
overview.agreement: By using TimeCraft, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
items: Account information (name, email address, password)
Profile information (preferences, goals, settings)
Contact information for support requests
Payment information (processed securely by third-party providers)

usageData.title: Usage Data
items: Task and productivity data you create and manage
Health and wellness metrics you choose to track
Focus session data and time tracking information
App usage patterns and feature interactions
Device information and technical data

autoCollected.title: Automatically Collected Data
items: Log data (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Cookies and similar tracking technologies
Analytics data for app performance and improvement

serviceProvision.title: Service Provision
items: Provide and maintain the TimeCraft service
Process your tasks and productivity data
Generate insights and recommendations
Sync data across your devices

communication.title: Communication
items: Send important service notifications
Respond to your inquiries and support requests
Provide updates about new features
Send promotional communications (with consent)

improvement.title: Improvement
items: Analyze usage patterns to improve features
Monitor performance and fix issues
Develop new features and services
Conduct research and analytics

legal.title: Legal & Security
items: Comply with legal obligations
Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
Enforce our terms of service
Protect user safety and security

dataProtection.title: Data Protection & Security
dataProtection.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:

access.title: Access & Portability
access.description: Request access to your personal data and receive a copy in a structured format.

correction.title: Correction & Updates
correction.description: Update or correct your personal information at any time through your account settings.

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.description: Request deletion of your account and personal data, subject to legal retention requirements.

optOut.title: Opt-out
optOut.description: Unsubscribe from marketing communications and adjust data processing preferences.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy:
periods: Account data: Retained while your account is active
Usage data: Aggregated and anonymized after 2 years
Support data: Retained for 3 years after resolution
Legal requirements: Retained as required by applicable laws

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.addressDetails:
TimeCraft Privacy Team
123 Productivity Lane
San Francisco, CA 94102
contact.responseTimeDetails: We aim to respond to privacy inquiries within 30 days.
contact.dataProtectionOfficerDetails: Available upon request for EU residents.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. For significant changes, we may also send you a direct notification via email.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using TimeCraft. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using TimeCraft, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
acceptance.governance: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of TimeCraft, operated by TimeCraft Inc. ("us", "we", or "our").

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.intro: TimeCraft is a comprehensive time management and wellness application that helps users:

productivity.title: Productivity Features
items: Task management and organization
Time tracking and focus sessions
Goal setting and progress monitoring
Analytics and insights

wellness.title: Wellness Features
items: Health metrics tracking
Wellness recommendations
Badge and achievement system
Social features and challenges

creation.title: Account Creation
items: You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
You must be at least 13 years old to create an account
One person may not maintain multiple accounts

responsibilities.title: Account Responsibilities
items: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
Keep your contact information up to date
Log out of your account at the end of each session

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.warning: You agree NOT to use the Service to:
prohibited: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Impersonate others or provide false information
Interfere with service security or functionality
Access data not intended for you
Use automated systems to access the service
Reverse engineer or copy our software
Use the service for commercial purposes without permission

terms.title: Payment Terms
items: Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually in advance
All payments are processed securely through third-party payment processors
Prices may change with 30 days notice to active subscribers
Refunds are available within 14 days of initial subscription (new subscribers only)
You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings
Upon cancellation, you retain access until the end of your current billing period

dataPrivacy.title: Data & Privacy
dataPrivacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of your information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.
principles: We collect only necessary information to provide our service
Your data is encrypted and stored securely
We don't sell your personal information to third parties
You own your content and data
You can export your data at any time
Data deletion is available upon account closure

ourRights.title: Our Rights
ourRights.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of TimeCraft Inc. and its licensors. The service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used without our prior written consent.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You retain all rights to content you create, upload, or share through the Service. By using our Service, you grant us a license to use, store, and share your content as necessary to provide the Service to you. This license ends when you delete your content or close your account.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
content: IN NO EVENT SHALL TIMECRAFT, ITS DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, PARTNERS, AGENTS, SUPPLIERS, OR AFFILIATES BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES.

THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS. WE MAKE NO WARRANTIES, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.
YOUR SOLE REMEDY FOR DISSATISFACTION WITH THE SERVICE IS TO STOP USING THE SERVICE AND CANCEL YOUR ACCOUNT.

byYou.title: By You
items: You may terminate your account at any time
Download your data before termination
Subscription billing stops at the end of current period
Some data may be retained for legal purposes

byUs.title: By Us
items: We may suspend or terminate accounts for Terms violations
We may discontinue the service with 30 days notice
We'll provide data export opportunities when possible
Refunds may be provided on a case-by-case basis

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect. Your continued use of the Service after the effective date of the revised Terms constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you must stop using the Service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
contact.addressDetails:
TimeCraft Legal Team
123 Productivity Lane
San Francisco, CA 94102

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the State of California, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the Service will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in San Francisco County, California.
